title: YOU HAVE DISCONNECTED. PLEASE CHECK YOUR INTERNET CONNECTION AND TRY AGAIN
body:
hey,bodys. i tried many ways to fix this problem--changed the DNS, repaired the client, delected the config file , uninstall and install the game. but none of them worked.......
i really need some help....

replies.body: Was this ever solved? I've been unable to play for a month because of this same issue. So annoyed.

Hey, I don't know if you've fixed this or not, but i may have solved it. This just happened to me and i pressed Ctrl + Shift + Esc which opens task manager, close all of League of Legends clients, refresh the client and try then, fixed it for me. :)

"You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again"

After updating to the latest patch the following message above keeps popping up as soon as the loading screen is launched. Rebooting, restarting client and reconnecting doesn't give any different results.

I'm currently running a full repair on the client to see if this will fix the problem.

Oh and I'm pretty sure it's not that my internet has been disconnected as i have no issues playing other online games, writing this post, streaming movies and none of my other flatmates in the house has complained about internet issues.

I have googled and i see there are several people here on the forum complaining about this exact issue with no real results. This post just happens to be the latest which is why i'm replying here.

Rito please.  {{item:3070}}

This error message indicates there's an issue with one or more of your local network configurations that could be causing a *poor connection* to our servers. I'd strongly recommend going through the steps listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to confirm that your local configuration is in good standing.

Should you still see issues after taking those steps, we can continue troubleshooting, just let me know.

Just to let you know, this did not fix the problem. It has been 6 months. I moved the exact same game files from my laptop that was having to the new PC I built and the problem never showed on my PC. Only on my laptop.{{item:3070}}
